skill.name: zinc-database
skill.description: Access ZINC (230M+ purchasable compounds). Search by ZINC ID/SMILES, similarity searches, 3D-ready structures for docking, analog discovery, for virtual screening and drug discovery.
skill.summary: Access ZINC (230M+ purchasable compounds). Search by ZINC ID/SMILES, similarity searches, 3D-ready s...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No executable code or security risks detected. This is a documentation-only skill that provides information about accessing the ZINC chemical database through standard API endpoints.

content.user_title: Search ZINC database for drug discovery compounds
content.value_statement: Finding purchasable compounds for drug screening is fragmented and time-consuming. This skill provides precise ZINC22 API workflows for 230M+ compounds.
actual_capabilities: Query ZINC22 by ZINC ID using CartBlanche22 API endpoints
Perform SMILES similarity searches with distance parameters
Retrieve random compound samples filtered by subset
Map supplier catalog codes to ZINC compound IDs
Explain tranche encoding for molecular property filtering
Guide 3D structure file downloads from ZINC repositories
limitations: Does not execute network requests or download files automatically
Cannot guarantee compound availability or data accuracy
Does not perform molecular docking calculations
Large dataset queries may be subject to rate limiting

use_cases.title: Build docking compound libraries
use_cases.description: Collect drug-like or lead-like ZINC22 subsets for molecular docking studies and virtual screening campaigns.

use_cases.title: Find purchasable analog compounds
use_cases.description: Search by SMILES similarity to discover commercially available analogs for hit-to-lead expansion.

use_cases.title: Sample chemical diversity
use_cases.description: Generate random compound sets and filter by molecular properties for screening library design.

prompt_templates.title: Look up ZINC compound
prompt_templates.prompt: Find ZINC000000000001 in ZINC22 and return the zinc_id, smiles, and supplier catalogs.

prompt_templates.title: Exact SMILES search
prompt_templates.prompt: Search ZINC22 for exact match of benzene SMILES c1ccccc1 and return zinc_id and smiles.

prompt_templates.title: Find similar compounds
prompt_templates.prompt: Run similarity search for aspirin SMILES CC(=O)Oc1ccccc1C(=O)O with dist=3 and show zinc_id, smiles, catalogs.

prompt_templates.title: Generate screening library
prompt_templates.prompt: Get 5000 drug-like random compounds from ZINC22 with zinc_id, smiles, tranche fields for docking.

output_examples.input: Find lead-like compounds and explain the tranche output
output: Retrieved 1000 lead-like compounds from ZINC22 random endpoint
Tranche H05P035M400-0 means: 5 H-bond donors, LogP 3.5, MW 400 Da, phase 0
Use tranche data to filter by molecular properties for your screening

best_practices: Start with exact searches before using similarity parameters
Request only necessary output fields to reduce data transfer
Respect rate limits by spacing queries and caching results
anti_patterns: Using high similarity distances without clear objectives
Requesting all available fields for large result sets
Attempting bulk downloads during peak server hours

faq.question: Does this work with ZINC20 and ZINC22?
faq.answer: Yes. Examples focus on ZINC22, but URLs can be adapted for ZINC20 endpoints.

faq.question: What are the API query limits?
faq.answer: ZINC does not publish limits. Use batching and delays for large queries.

faq.question: Can I integrate with Python or RDKit?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill provides Python patterns for API queries and result parsing.

faq.question: Does this access my local files?
faq.answer: No. It only documents ZINC API usage and does not read local data.

faq.question: What if my search returns no results?
faq.answer: Check SMILES syntax, verify ZINC IDs, or try lower similarity distances.

faq.question: How is this better than manual browsing?
faq.answer: It automates API queries and bulk workflows instead of manual web searches.
